backend.name: agent-arch-api-prod
backend.manualDeploy: cd backend && zip -r ../deploy.zip . -x 'venv/*' -x '__pycache__/*' -x 'tests/*' && az webapp deploy --name agent-arch-api-prod --resource-group rg-agent-architecture --src-path ../deploy.zip --type zip

frontend.name: agent-arch-web-prod
frontend.manualDeploy: cd frontend && npm run build && cp staticwebapp.config.json out/ && npx swa deploy out --deployment-token <TOKEN> --env production
